name: Swipe Balls
description:
Swipe Balls is a simple yet addictive puzzle game. You swipe groups of 3 or more same balls. Swipe as many groups as possible until one column reaches the top of the screen. Gear up for this entertaining and casual game and you won't be able to put this game down for hours.

Tips:
★ Bombs will bring you special benefits.
★ Long chain will give you bonus score.

Features:
★ CHRISTMAS THEME included.
★ Perfect support for iPhone 5 and iOS 6.
★ Fun of swiping.
★ Very cute and clean graphics.
★ High quality sound effects.
★ Game Center leaderboards.
★ Endless game, unlimited fun.
★ Retina display optimised.
★ Universal game: iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch.

Enjoy!
